paper.title: The Need for Formal Methods for Integrated Circuit Design
paper.abstract: This paper has reviewed the typical rt1 and behavioral synthesis design flows and identified areas where formal methods can be applied. In particular, the problems of design and implementation verification were identified as amenable to formal techniques and a number of well-motivated areas for research were identified.
